pages.text: A silent and difficult to spot quadruped found natively inhabiting grasslands and forests. $(br2) 1. Explosive Fuse $(br) A cerebral-controlled explosive located in the lower midsection provides an powerful deterant to god knows what. AI still cannot determine what could have caused this evolutionary trait to
emerge, as it provides no repoductive advantage.

2. Legs $(br) Four extremely short but strong legs provide the creeper with slow but nearly silent movement over any natural terrain, including leaves and twigs. $(br2) Assessment: Avoid or eliminate from a distance
